Class NexmoVerifyClient

java.lang.Object

public class NexmoVerifyClient
extends java.lang.Object

Java client for the Nexmo Verification API - https://docs.nexmo.com/index.php/verify

Author:
Wale Olaleye

NexmoVerifyClient

public NexmoVerifyClient(java.lang.String baseUrl,
                         java.lang.String apiKey,
                         java.lang.String apiSecret,
                         int connectionTimeout,
                         int soTimeout,
                         boolean signRequests,
                         java.lang.String signatureSecretKey)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
Parameters:
baseUrl - Base API URL. Does not include the path.
apiKey - Your API public key
apiSecret - Your API secret key
connectionTimeout - HTTP connection timeout
soTimeout - HTTP Read timeout
signRequests - Should we sign requests?
signatureSecretKey - Request signing key

java.lang.Exception

Parameters:
verifyRequest - Takes a VerifyRequest object

checkRequest

public CheckResponse checkRequest(java.lang.String requestId,
                                  java.lang.String code)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
This is the second step. Supply the request_id and authentication code the user received on their cell phone. This method takes only the required parameters as a convenience.

Parameters:
requestId - Identifier of the verification request to be checked
code - PIN code your end user provided to you (maximum 6 digits)
Returns:
CheckResponse
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

checkRequest

public CheckResponse checkRequest(java.lang.String requestId,
                                  java.lang.String code,
                                  java.lang.String ipAddress)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
This is the second step. Supply the request_id and authentication code the user received on their cell phone.

Parameters:
requestId - Identifier of the verification request to be checked.
code - PIN code your end user provided to you (maximum 6 digits)
ipAddress - The IP Address the end user provided you the PIN code from
Returns:
CheckResponse
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

search

public SearchResponse search(java.lang.String requestId)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
The Verification Search API call enables you to get the status and many other attributes of a verification request even if the verification is still in progress.

Parameters:
requestId - Identifier of a single request to be looked up
Returns:
SearchResponse
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

search

public SearchResponse[] search(java.util.List<java.lang.String> requestIds)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
The Verification Search API call enables you to get the status and many other attributes of a verification request even if the verification is still in progress.

Parameters:
requestIds - Identifier of up to 10 requests to be looked up.
Returns:
SearchResponse
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
